Actions.Name: Window Cycle
Actions.Tooltip: Navigate through open windows with Task View (Alt+Tab) using knob rotation

Actions.Name: Clock Enhanced
Actions.Tooltip: Advanced customizable clock with 13 fonts, custom formats, webhooks and more

Actions.Name: Webhook Knob
Actions.Tooltip: Trigger up to 3 different webhooks with knob rotation and press actions

Author: Dudu Lima
Description: Multi-functional plugin with Window Cycle (Alt+Tab navigation), Advanced Clock (13 fonts, webhook integration), and Webhook Knob (3 webhook triggers). Perfect for productivity and automation!
Name: WindowCycle Utils
